description:
Nestled peacefully back from the street on a prized 645sqm block, this charming restored Bungalow residence retains original charm alongside contemporary inclusions; to provide the quintessential family haven. This home is the harmonious union of timeless architectural features fused with sophisticated modern updates, to offer a home you will want to call your own.

From the moment you walk through the front doors you are greeted by the original hardwood floors , deep skirting and ornate high ceiling detailing throughout all featuring horsehair plaster with an individualised unique decorative feature in each room.

Elegant formal living showcases a custom ceiling- high bookcase of your dreams, gas heating and elegant ornate decorative ceiling, flowing into the dining area with original fireplace surrounds ; with sensitively installed combustion fireplace to warm through the winter months.

The newly renovated kitchen features soft grey Caesarstone benchtops and white shaker style soft closed cabinetry with subway tile splash-back, electric cooktop, dishwasher and an abundance of storage.

Three generously portioned bedrooms, all with unique ceiling feature, ceiling fans, built-in robes, new custom ceiling high sheers and blockouts and brand-new sash windows throughout; in addition a separate fourth bedroom or home office to the rear of the house with access to its own private bathroom.

The main bathroom, recently renovated and thoughtful layout, with modern deep bath, shower and toilet.

There is no prettier vision than the sight that greets you when you step outside onto the paved pergola area. Relax by the fire pit or curl up on the hammock and unwind in this lovingly tended English patir cottage garden; featuring ornamental grape vine sweeping the pergola edge, established succulent wall, rainforest garden, and nestled amongst a collectors dreams of maples and roses lies a bespoke artisanal painted cubby perfect for children to escape and play. To the rear of the property lies a robust and bountiful series of raised vegetable garden beds guarded by an essential white picket fence.

Falling into the catchment of Riverstone Public School & Riverstone High School. Close proximity to Riverstone Train Station, Fresh Star Super Market and walking distance to great amenities such as Riverstone Swimming Centre and Riverstone Schofields Memorial Club.

Additional features include; playroom, separate art studio or workshop, and customised home office; garden shed; ducted air-conditioning; 3 split system air-conditioning; internal laundry; gas heating with 2 X 45kg tank, ceiling fans and freshly painted throughout.

This property offers a superb combination of period appeal and modern comfort. Full of happy memories, this home is ready for its next exciting chapter. With nothing left to do except move in. For more information about this truly unique home call Glenn Hayden on 0409 993 995 or Suzi Green on 0431 867 511
